article:
A 'content management framework' ('CMF') is a system that facilitates the use of
reusable components or customized software for managing web content. It shares
aspects of a web application framework and a content management system (CMS).

Below is a list of notable systems that claim to be CMFs. {|
class="wikitable sortable"
|- style="background:#EFEFEF"

|- 60seconds CMS
|PHP 5 and MySQL
|-

|-
